name: Congruent Info - Tech
tag_list: custom-software-development, application-maintenance, application-migration, testing-services, mobile-application-development, saas-application-development, microsoft-sharepoint-services, microsoft-dynamics-erp--crm-services
overview:
Congruent, a Microsoft gold certified partner is a Global IT Services company which specializes in providing outsourced software development and systems integration services to ISVs and Fortune 500 companies alike. Being the single source for all your business technology needs, Congruent is headquartered at Seattle, Washington with its offshore development center based at Chennai, India.

With more than a decade of experience in offshore development, Congruent offers an array of services like:

• Product/Custom Application Development on Microsoft Technologies (DotNet, SQL Server) • Building multi-tenant SaaS applications or migrating your line of business applications into cloud • Building Mobile applications on iOS(iPhone and iPad), Android, Windows Phone and Blackberry • Microsoft SharePoint - Customization, Implementation and Configuration • Microsoft Business Intelligence –SSAS, SSIS & SSRS • Microsoft Dynamics GP, SL & NAV – Implementation / Support / Integration/ Customization /Upgrade • Microsoft Dynamics CRM - Implementation / Support / Integration/ Customization /Upgrade • Independent Testing Services for desktop and mobile applications

Our customers include a wide range of companies, from a Startup solution provider, ISV’s to enterprise clients like 3M, Starbucks Coffee, Utilities and Transportation Commission, Codexis, Pescado, Maldives Airport, VeePee etc.

Visit our website www.congruentindia.com to know about our detailed offerings, methodologies and our client list.
